channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP HANA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP HANA

item.title: CVE-2021-21484|2024-08-03T18:16:22.549Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20hana
item.description: LDAP authentication in SAP HANA Database version 2.0 can be bypassed if the attached LDAP directory server is configured to enable unauthenticated bind.
